variable.name: params.is_vnfm_register_only
variable.description: If TRUE, the only VNFM will be subscribed to the NFVO. If FALSE, the VNFM wiil be subscribed to the NFVO and the NFVO to the VNFM.

task.displayName: Ensure vnf package mgmt subscription is deleted
